text: William "Billy" Gardell (born August 20, 1969) is an American actor. He currently acts in the television series Mike & Molly. He also made an appearance in several episodes of My Name Is Earl. He voiced Santa in Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors category:American voice actors
title: Billy Gardell
